Records.copado__Script__c:
copado --progress "Creating SFDX Folder"
sfdx force:project:create -n InstallationProject
cd InstallationProject

#Get base Salesforce URL using SoapEndpoint
#Needs to be in https://companyname.lightning.force.com format
InstanceUrl=$(echo "$endpointID" | cut -d'/' -f3)
InstanceUrl="https://"$InstanceUrl

sfdx force:config:set instanceUrl="$InstanceUrl" --global
if [ $uninstall == true ]
then
   copado --progress "Uninstalling"
   sfdx force:package:uninstall --package $packageID -u $sessionID -w 1000
else
   copado --progress "Installing"
   copado -p "ApexCompile is $apexcompile"
   sfdx force:package:install --package $packageID -u $sessionID --apexcompile $apexcompile -w 1000
fi
Records.Name: Install 2G Package
